abstract: Russia invites North Korean leader Kim Jong-un to visit during its May 9 celebrations of 70th anniversary of Soviet Union's defeat of Nazi Germany; trip would be Kim's first abroad since coming to power in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The possible visit would be Kim Jong-un’s first trip abroad since taking control of his country in late 2011, an official said.
snippet: The possible visit would be Kim Jong-un’s first trip abroad since taking control of his country in late 2011, an official said.

headline.main: North Korean Leader May Visit Moscow, Russia Says
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Leader May Visit Russia
